name: Paranormal Investigator (Sebastien Lagos-fuentes)
description:
This game is a school project I've helped build, I was the game designer. You play as a priest sent by the Vatican to investigate a haunted church.

Control Scheme:

-WASD to move.

-Move Mouse to look around.

-CTRL to crouch.

-E to interact.

Team: 

Game Designer: Sebastien Lagos-Fuentes

Scripter: Dimitri Sky

Scripter: Francis Faubert

Art: Paulo Gois
